title: Bella Flor
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Veg-friendly restaurant located around 200 meters from the Pucar√° de Tilcara, one of the main sights of the town. Serves two menu options on a daily basis for lunch - one of them is vegetarian (and can be made vegan). Also offers other dishes a la carte, some of them suitable for vegans. Serves some local dishes and only uses fresh ingredients (no processed products). Opened since December 2015. Doesn't accept credit cards.
